Package arcade.patch.env.operation

Class PatchOperationGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.operation.PatchOperation
      • arcade.patch.env.operation.PatchOperationGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation
    public class PatchOperationGenerator
extends PatchOperation
    Extension of PatchOperation for generation.

    Operation updates the associated lattice field with values provided in the delta array for a molecule with given CONCENTRATION and PERMEABILITY. The delta array defaults to zero (no changes to lattice field) and can be modified by external classes. Operation is independent of underlying geometry.
